page.title: 08Malden Rushet
page.content:
Malden Rushett is very small. It has one shop, two garages, one pub (the Fox & Hounds) and a few houses at the cross roads of the main Kingston, Leatherhead road and the minor Epsom, Oxshot road.
There is a garden centre serving the more populated area of Kingston and two engineering firms. One of these makes machines for the plastic industry. There is also a timber yard that also sells sheds and rustic garden furniture.
An unusual farm for this area is {Rushett Farm}selling Trout, venison, hare and rabbit.
